location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Secretary in the Secret, Political and Foreign Department, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: In the letter, the Resident explains that he has lent Shiek Abdul Russool [Shaikh ‘Abd al-Rasūl Khān] 5000 Piasters [Piastres] due to difficulties he is experiencing with the Persian Government, which is to be recovered via duty payments on the company's wool.
